Articles.Content:
I have landed everywhere and got back to Kerbin.

I have designed great ships and gone where no one has gone.

I have spent moments in space and asking myself - why are we here?

So, what next?
You could try out HOCGaming's idea of building tourism facilities in space.

Its a sandbox game, play around! Do challenges, build even better/effective ships for specific (even crazy) tasks, find all anomalies, download kethane mod and build mining colonies+refuel stations so you can rescue kerbals from anywhere.

Build a space station.

build a base.

make your current stuff smaller and more efficient!

MODS.

Do the reddit weekly challenge.

do forum challenges.
Why not take some idea or activity you've already tested and proven previously, take it to the drawing board and scale it to Ridiculous? Make a spectacle out of the game.

Used any mods? If not try them

They can add a whole new dimension to the game.

What's next? What's NOT next?

Bases on all planets! Stations to supply them! Stations to refuel vessels en route to them! Rover races on Duna! Sun escape velocity! Massive mobile bases! Grand tour! Sacrificial Jool station! Laythe resort! Space battles! super carriers! SSTOs! SSTOs to the Mun and back! Eve plane, Laythe plane, Duna plane and Jool plane! The universe is YOUR plaything. Screw ethics, we're sending a Kerbal from the surface of Gilly to the surface of Eve using only his/her RCS pack.

The possibilities are endless.

[deleted]

Edited January 14 by PetahSchwetah
